languages.text: "Ну как сказать. По нашему — все, кто мог сдохнуть, сдохли и догнивают. А зараза и паразиты в мертвяках не живут обычно. Мы пару отбракованных в карантинную зону скидывали, и можем сказать, что померли они в конце от жажды, а не от болезни".

traits.locale_text: "Ну как сказать. По нашему — все, кто мог сдохнуть, сдохли и догнивают. А зараза и паразиты в мертвяках не живут обычно. Мы пару отбракованных в зону скидывали, и можем сказать, что померли они в конце от жажды, а не от болезни".

languages.text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."
languages.original_text: "Ну как сказать. По нашему — все, кто мог сдохнуть, сдохли и догнивают. А зараза и паразиты в мертвяках не живут обычно. Мы пару отбракованных в карантинную зону скидывали, и можем сказать, что померли они в конце от жажды, а не от болезни".

traits.locale_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

"Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could die are dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in there, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

"Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

"Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in there, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

"Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

"Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

languages.text: “嗯，这个得看情况。我们认为，所有能死的人都已经死了，而且都已经烂了。疾病和寄生虫通常不会寄生在尸体上。我们派了几个用完就可以报废的家伙进去，而且我们可以很确信地说，那些人最后都是渴死的，不是病死的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，这个得看情况。我们认为，所有能死的人都已经死了，而且都已经烂了。疾病和寄生虫通常不会寄生在尸体上。我们派了几个用完就可以报废的家伙进去，而且我们可以很确信地说，那些人最后都是渴死的，不是病死的。”

languages.text: «Bueno, eso depende. Por lo que sabemos, todos los que podían morir están muertos y podridos. Y las enfermedades y los parásitos no duran mucho en cadáveres. Enviamos personal prescindible a la zona de cuarentena y podemos confirmar que murieron de sed y no por ninguna enfermedad».
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, eso depende. Por lo que sabemos, todos los que podían morir están muertos y podridos. Y las enfermedades y los parásitos no duran mucho en cadáveres. Enviamos personal prescindible a la zona de cuarentena y podemos confirmar que murieron de sed y no por ninguna enfermedad».

languages.text: 「それは…時と場合によります。私共は、死んだ可能性のある奴らは揃って、腐って死んだと判断しています。それに、普通なら病気も寄生体も死体の中では生きられません。隔離区域にいくつか物資を投入しましたが、彼らを死に至らしめたのは、病気ではなく水不足でしょう」
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: 「それは…時と場合によります。私共は、死んだ可能性のある奴らは揃って、腐って死んだと判断しています。それに、普通なら病気も寄生体も死体の中では生きられません。隔離区域にいくつか物資を投入しましたが、彼らを死に至らしめたのは、病気ではなく水不足でしょう」

languages.text: "Na ja, kommt drauf an. Wir glauben, dass alle, die sterben konnten, auch gestorben sind und jetzt verrotten. Krankheiten und Parasiten leben normalerweise nicht in Leichen. Wir haben ein paar entbehrliche Subjekte in die Quarantänezone geworfen und können mit Sicherheit sagen, dass sie am Ende der Durst umgebracht hat, keine Krankheit."
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, kommt drauf an. Wir glauben, dass alle, die sterben konnten, auch gestorben sind und jetzt verrotten. Krankheiten und Parasiten leben normalerweise nicht in Leichen. Wir haben ein paar entbehrliche Subjekte in die Quarantänezone geworfen und können mit Sicherheit sagen, dass sie am Ende der Durst umgebracht hat, keine Krankheit."

languages.text: « Alors... Ça dépend. Tous ceux qui devaient mourir sont sûrement morts et re-morts à l'heure qu'il est. Et la maladie et les parasites, généralement, ça traîne pas dans les cadavres. On a balancé quelques gars sans importance dans la zone, et on peut affirmer avec certitude que c'est la soif qui les a tués, et pas des germes quelconques. »
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: « Alors... Ça dépend. Tous ceux qui devaient mourir sont sûrement morts et re-morts à l'heure qu'il est. Et la maladie et les parasites, généralement, ça traîne pas dans les cadavres. On a balancé quelques gars sans importance dans la zone, et on peut affirmer avec certitude que c'est la soif qui les a tués, et pas des germes quelconques. »

languages.text: "Sayılır. Ölmesi gerekenlerin öldüğünü düşünüyoruz. Hastalık ve parazitler de cesetlerde genelde çok yaşamaz. Birkaç gereksizi karantina bölgesine yolladık. Onların da hastalıktan değil, susuzluktan nalları diktiğinden eminiz."
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends. We figure everyone who could have died is dead and rotting. And disease and parasites don't usually live in corpses. We threw a few expendables in the quarantine zone, and we can say for sure that it was thirst that killed them in the end, not disease."

traits.locale_text: "Duruma göre değişir. Ölebilecek herkesin öldüğünü ve çürüdüğünü düşünüyoruz. Hastalık ve parazitler de cesetlerde genellikle çok yaşamaz. Karantina bölgesine birkaç müsvedde yolladık, nihayetinde hastalıktan değil susuzluktan öldüklerine temin ederim sizi."
